snippet.title: Police confirm identity of pedestrian
snippet.content: POLICE have thanked the public and media for help identifying a Frankston man involved in a serious accident. Investigators have confirmed the pedestrian to be a 28-year-old Frankston man. The man continues to receive treatment in hospital and the investigation is ongoing. He crossed into the path of a west bound Jeep and was struck by a vehicle on Cranbourne Rd. on July 27 at about 11.10pm. He was flown to the Alfred with serious head, chest, pelvis and leg injuries.
